definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[עָמַד]]:520 take one's stand, stand (NH id.; Ph. [[עמד]]; As. emêdu, stand, set up; Ar. 9amada prop up, support, and deriv.; Eth. 9md: pillar; Targum [[עַמּוּדָא]] pillar, Syr. 9amuwdo0, Palm. [[עמודא]], cf. also n. pr. [[תימעמד]]; Sab. [[עמד]] pillar, acc. to CIS:iv. 91 (or other deriv. fr. √ [[עמד]] DHM:ZMG xxxvii (1883), 5), pl. [[אעמדן]] pillars DHM:Epigr. Denkm. sus Abess. 80);—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: take one's stand, and (esp. pt.) stand, be in a standing attitude: c. [[עַל]] by, 1Sa 26:13, 2Sa 2:25, 2Ki 2:7 +, so pt. Ge 18:8 (J), Ge 41:1, Ge 41:17 (E) +, [[עַל]] on, Ex 3:5 (E), De 27:12 +; c. [[ב]] loc. Ex 32:26, Nu 22:24, Nu 22:26 (all JE), +; c. [[אֶל]] loc. 1Ki 20:38 (+ [[לְ]] pers.), Je 48:19, Ez Eze 21:26, Eze 27:29; c. [[אֶל]] pers. 1Sa 17:51, 2Ki 5:25; c. [[אֵחֶל]] Ge 41:3 (E), Ez Eze 9:2, Eze 10:6, Ne 8:4; c. [[לִפְנֵי]] Ge 18:22, 1Ki 3:16, 1Ki 8:22 +; before ´[[י]], for intercession Ge 19:27 (J), De 4:10, Je 15:1, Je 18:20, etc.; take one's stand and do a thing 1Sa 17:8, 1Ki 8:55, 2Ki 18:28 = Is 36:13 +; sq. inf. 1Ki 8:11 = 2Ch 5:14 +.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: stand forth (to speak, etc.) 2Ki 10:9 +.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: take a stand against ([[עַל]]), in opposition to, Ju Jdg 6:31, Ezr 10:15 (but stand over, = have charge of, acc. to Kue:Ges. Abh. 247 f.) 2Ch 26:18; cf. [[עַל־דַּם]] Le 19:16 (H) against the blood of, i.e. seek one's blood, life; c. [[יׇ֑חַד]] Is 50:8 together, i.e. against each other.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: present oneself before ([[לִפְנֵי]]) Ge 43:15 (J), Ex 9:10 (E), Nu 27:2, Nu 27:21 (P), 1Sa 16:21 +; before ´[[י]] (in sanctuary) De 19:17, Je 7:10 cf. Je 18:20, Le 9:5 (P); so in heaven 1Ki 22:21 = 2Ch 18:20; c. [[ב]] loc. of child at birth Ho 13:13, in palace (as retainer, courtier) Da 1:4

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: c. [[לִפְנֵי]] attend upon, be(come) servant of 1Sa 16:22 (v. Dr), 1Ki 1:2 +; servant of ´[[י]] 1Ki 17:1, 1Ki 18:15, 2Ki 3:14, 2Ki 5:16, Je 15:19; priests ([[לְשָֽׁרְתוֹ]])´[[לִפְנֵי י]] De 10:8, Ju Jdg 20:28, Ez Eze 44:15, 2Ch 29:11; of Levites, stand before congreg. for menial duties Ez Eze 44:11, Nu 16:9 (P).

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: stand (silent) Job 32:16.

definitions.title: h.
definitions.body: stand (appealingly) Job 30:20 (but rd. [[עָמַדְתָּ]], of God, Me Hi Du).

definitions.title: i.
definitions.body: stand, subj. [[רֶגֶל]] Zec 14:4 ([[עַל]] loc.), Ps 122:2 ([[ב]] loc.) so Ps 26:12 (fig.).

definitions.title: j.
definitions.body: stand, of water, [[עַל־הָרִים]] Ps 104:6. Vid. also preps. [[אֶל]], [[אֵחֶל]], [[עַל]], [[מִמַּעַל]], [[עִם]], etc.

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: stand still, stop, cease moving, of moon Jos 10:13 (JE; ‖[[וַיִּדּׂם]]), sun v:Jos 10:13, both, Hb Hab 3:11; of pers. 1Sa 9:27 (opp. [[עָבַר]]), 2Sa 2:28 (opp. [[רָדַף]]), [[עִמְדוּ עֲמׂ֫דוּ]] Na 2:9 +; stop flowing (of oil) 2Ki 4:6; remain standing, c. [[תַּחְתֵּינוּ]] Ju Jdg 7:21, 1Sa 14:9 etc.; of eruption in skin = remain unchanged Le 13:23, Le 13:28; so (without ´[[ת]]) Le 13:5, Le 13:37 (all P).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: = be inactive 2Ch 20:17 (opp. [[לְהִלָּחֵם]], + [[הִתְיַצְּבוּ]]).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: = be attentive Job 37:14.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: stop, cease doing a thing 2Ki 13:18; c. [[מִן]] Ge 29:35, Ge 30:9 (both J), Joe 1:15.

definitions.title: 3. a.
definitions.body: tarry, delay Ge 45:9 (E), Jos 10:19 (JE; opp. [[רָדַף]]), 1Sa 20:38 (opp. [[מְהֵרָה]], [[חוּשָׁה]]), +.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: remain, c. [[ב]] loc. 2Ki 15:20, De 10:10; c. [[עִמָּדִי]] De 5:28 (opp. [[שׁוּב]]); + inf. purpose Es 7:7.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: continue, abide Je 32:14, Is 66:22, Ps 102:27 (opp. [[אָבַד]]); = dwell Ex 8:18 (J; [[עַל]] loc.); [[לָעַד]] Ps 19:10, Ps 111:3, Ps 111:10, Ps 112:3, Ps 112:9; [[לְעוֹלָם]] Ps 33:11, Ec 1:4; [[בְּתוֹךְ]] Hag 2:5; of plan = be established Ps 33:11 (earlier [[קוּם]], as Is 14:24), so Es 3:4, Da 11:17 b; = maintain itself (earlier [[קוּם]] Jos 2:11) Ec 2:9; [[לאׁ יַעֲמָד־בִּי כׂחַ]] Da 10:17.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: be steadfast De 25:8, Ru 2:7.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: persist Ec 8:3.

make a stand, hold one's ground, Am 2:15, 2Ki 10:4, Mal 3:2 +; c. [[לִפְנֵי]] Ju Jdg 2:14, 2Ki 10:4 +, [[בִּפְנֵי]] Jos 10:8, Jos 21:44 (Ginsb; van d. H. Baer v:42), Jos 23:9 (all D); c. [[עַל]], for one's life Es 8:11, Es 9:16.
stand upright:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: remain standing 2Ki 13:6; of head 2Ki 6:31 remain upright upon him ([[עָלָיו]]); of house (fig. of endurance) Job 8:15, Pr 12:7.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: stand up, opp. sit, Ne 8:5, Job 29:8 (+ [[קוּם]]); opp. lie prostrate Ez Eze 2:1 ([[עַל־רַגְלֶיְ]]), so Eze 37:10 (id.), Da 10:1, v:Da 10:11 ([[עַל־עָמְדְָָ]]), Es 8:4; of revival after death Da 12:13 (late for [[קוּם]]).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: stand up, rise, of water Jos 3:13 (+ appos. [[נֵד אֶחָד]]), v:Jos 3:16 (+ [[קָמוּ]] + id.; both JE).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: be erect, upright, of boards Ex 26:15, Ex 36:20 (P). †

definitions.title: 6. a.
definitions.body: arise, appear, come on the scene (= [[קוּם]]; late) Ezr 2:63 = Ne 7:65, Ps 106:30 (cf. Sir 47:1, Sir 47:12), esp. Da 8:22, Da 8:22, Da 8:23, Da 11:2, Da 11:3, Da 11:4, Da 12:1, cf. Da 11:7 ([[כַּנּוֹ]]), v:Da 11:20, v:Da 11:21 ([[עַל־כַּנּוֹ]]); c. [[תַּחַת]] instead of Ec 4:15; of war 1Ch 20:4, deliverance Es 4:14.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: stand forth, appear = come into being Is 48:13, Ps 33:9, Ps 119:90.

definitions.title: c.

definitions.body: [[לְנֶגְדִּי]] against Da 10:13.
